title: Sunnah way to perform Ruku & Sujood from a sitting position in voluntary prayers
transcript: in voluntary prayer if you're sitting like i'm sitting and you want to do roku you just simply say allahu akbar and bow down subhanallah in subhanallah if you can make sujud you have to make sujud on the ground but if you have an illness or pain that prevents you from making sujud on the ground then you have to go a bit deeper incline more a little bit and make your sujud and allah knows best you
